    • getWordEmbeddingPath

      public String getWordEmbeddingPath()
      Gets the path to the word embedding file. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Simple getter method that retrieves a string value.

    • setWordEmbeddingPath

      public void setWordEmbeddingPath(String wordEmbeddingPath)
      Sets the path to the word embedding file. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Assigns a value to a variable and prints a message.
      Parameters:
      wordEmbeddingPath - Path to the word embedding file.

    • getGoogle1000Path

      public String getGoogle1000Path()
      Gets the path to the Google-1000 file. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Simple getter method that retrieves a string value.

    • setGoogle1000Path

      public void setGoogle1000Path(String google1000Path)
      Sets the path to the Google-1000 file. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Assigns a value to a variable and prints a message.
      Parameters:
      google1000Path - Path to the Google-1000 file.

    • getOutputFilePath

      public String getOutputFilePath()
      Gets the path to the output file. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Simple getter method that retrieves a string value.

    • setOutputFilePath

      public void setOutputFilePath(String outputFilePath)
      Sets the path to the output file. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Assigns a value to a variable and prints a message.
      Parameters:

    • getSelectedAlgorithms

      public List<AbstractSimilarityAlgorithm> getSelectedAlgorithms()
      Gets the list of selected similarity algorithms. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Returns a reference to the list, which is a constant-time operation.

    • setSelectedAlgorithms

      public void setSelectedAlgorithms(List<AbstractSimilarityAlgorithm> algorithms)
      Sets the list of selected similarity algorithms. Time Complexity: O(n) - Rationale: Clears the existing list and adds new algorithms. Both operations are linear in the size of the list.
      Parameters:
      algorithms - List of similarity algorithms to set.

    • getReplacementMethod

      public String getReplacementMethod()
      Gets the replacement method. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Simple getter method that retrieves a string value.

    • setReplacementMethod

      public void setReplacementMethod(String replacementMethod)
      Sets the replacement method. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Assigns a value to a variable and prints a message.
      Parameters:
      replacementMethod - The replacement method to set.

    • printConfiguration

      public void printConfiguration()
      Prints the current configuration. Time Complexity: O(n) - Rationale: Iterates through the list of selected algorithms to print their names.

    • resetToDefault

      public void resetToDefault()
      Resets the configuration to default values. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Clears the list of algorithms and adds a default algorithm, both constant-time operations.

    • isReplacementAllowed

      public boolean isReplacementAllowed(String word)
      Determines whether a word can be replaced based on the replacement method. Time Complexity: O(1) - Rationale: Simple logic based on the replacement method string.
      Parameters:
      word - Word to check
      Returns:
      True if replacement is allowed.
